// pseudo3D variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/WlffzB

#define S(v) smoothstep( 9./R.y , 0. , v )           // AA draw
#define s(v) ( .5 + .5* cos(3.14*v/.1) )             // strip pattern 

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    O = vec4(.5,0,0,0);
    mat2 M = mat2(1,-1,1,1);                         // for 45Â° rotations
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         U = 3. * ( 2.*u - R ) / R.y + iTime,
         I = floor( U * M ),                         // edge id (vec)
         F = ( fract(U) - .5 ) *M / 1.414, f, S;     // quad center to edge domain
    
  //O -= S( length(F) - .1 );                        // dots

    float i = I.y + 10.*I.x +99.,                    // edge id (float)
          r = fract(4e4*sin(i));                     // rand(id)
    O = r < .5
        ? f = abs( abs(F) - .353 ),
          S = S(f-.1), F = S * s(f),                 //  X at edge
          mix( O,   F.x + F.y 
                  - ( F.yx*(.5+.5*cos(6.28*f/.71))) [int(4.*r)]  // random crossing order
                 + O.yyxw ,
               max(S.x,S.y) )
        :(                           
          r = abs( length(F) - .353 ),               // )( at edge
          mix( O, s(r) + O.yyxy, S(r-.1) ) );

 // O -= .4*( .5+.5*cos(6.3*r + vec4(0,2,-2,0)) );   // coloring ( debug )
}
